li.span: School Closure Information

a.span: Messages from Madera County Department of Public Health

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });
$(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

p.span: This page is a resource for parents and school administrators regarding the Coronavirus (COVID-19).

span.a: Link to an informational websiteforCoronavirus (COVID-19) in California.

strong.span: *All schools will be closeduntil the end of the school year.

p.span: Meals for students will still be distributed at the elementary school sites and K-8 country schools. We would like to ask that ONLY families who are in need, show up to receive the student meals due to our food capacity. We thank you for your cooperation in this matter and hope you understand that we are continuing to adapt during this difficult time. Please see the information below for the new plan details.
A weeks worth of food for each student
Distribution Sites: All elementary schools including K-8 country schools

li.span: Wash your hands often with soap and water
Avoid touching your face with unwashed hands
Avoid close contact with people who are sick
Stay home when you are sick
Wash your hands frequently
Cover mouth and nose with a tissue or sleeve (not hands) when coughing or sneezing
Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces

span.strong: How can you keep informed on the coronavirus outbreak?
span.br: The latest news about the coronavirus outbreak and actions recommended by the Centers for Disease Control is available online at https://www.cdc.gov/ and through the Madera County Department of Public Health at https://www.maderacounty.com/government/public-health.

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

div.h1: Informacin Sobre el Cierre de las Escuelas

div.script: $(document).ready(function() {CheckScript('ModuleView');CheckScript('Mustache'); });

p.span: Esta pgina es un recurso para padres y administradores escolares sobre el Coronavirus (COVID-19). Sitio web informativo para elCoronavirus (COVID-19) en California

strong.span: * Todas las escuelas estarn cerradas hasta el final del ao escolar.

li.span: Dade distribucins: SOLO los martes
Horario: 11:00 a.m. a 12:30 p.m.
Kit de comidaincluir:
Comida para una semana para cada estudiante
Sitios de distribucin: todas las escuelas primarias, incluidas las escuelas de K-8
Lvese las manos frecuentemente con agua y jabn
Evite tocarse la cara con las manos sin lavar
Evitar el contacto cercano con personas que estn enfermas
Qudese en casa cuando est enfermo
Lava tus manos frecuentemente
Cbrase la boca y la nariz con un pauelo o una manga (no con las manos) cuando tosa o estornude
Limpie y desinfecte objetos y superficies que se tocan con frecuencia.

p.span: Cmo puede mantenerse informado sobre el brote de coronavirus? Las ltimas noticias sobre el brote de coronavirus y las acciones recomendadas por los Centros para el Control de Enfermedades estn disponibles en lnea en https://www.cdc.gov/ y a travs del Departamento de Salud Pblica del Condado de Madera en https://www.maderacounty.com/government/public-health.
